sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE  SourceTableName='FactTransactions' ORDER BY LoadPriority

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  * 
	FROM process.ProcessView 
WHERE SourceConnectionID = 14 AND
	 (TemplateName = 'INCR')

SELECT * 
	FROM process.ProcessView 
WHERE SourceConnectionID = 14 AND
	 (IncrementalLoad = 0  OR TemplateName = 'FULL')

query.value:
SELECT	@{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID,
		@{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, 
		@{item().FieldList}
FROM 
		@{item().SourceTableName}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT c.TABLE_CATALOG AS TableCatalog, 
c.TABLE_SCHEMA AS TableSchema, 
c.TABLE_NAME AS TableName, 
c.COLUMN_NAME AS ColumnName,
CASE WHEN x.TABLE_NAME IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN x.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END AS PrimaryKey,
c.ORDINAL_POSITION AS OrdinalPosition, 
CASE
				WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('real','money','decimal','numeric') THEN 'numeric(28,12)'
				WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH < 1 THEN 'nvarchar(max)'
				WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH > 1024 THEN 'nvarchar(max)'
				WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH BETWEEN 1 AND 1024 THEN 'nvarchar(' + convert(varchar,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH) + ')'
				--WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH BETWEEN 8 AND 32 THEN 'nvarchar(32)'
				--WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH BETWEEN 32 AND 128 THEN 'nvarchar(128)'
				--WHEN c.DATA_TYPE IN ('char','nvarchar','varchar','nchar') AND CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH BETWEEN 128 AND 1024 THEN 'nvarchar(1024)'
				ELSE c.DATA_TYPE
			 END as DataType 
FROM information_schema.columns c
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME 
		         FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
                 WHERE OBJECTPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID(CONSTRAINT_SCHEMA + '.' + QUOTENAME(CONSTRAINT_NAME)), 'ISPRIMARYKEY') = 1
                ) x ON x.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.TABLE_SCHEMA
                   AND x.TABLE_NAME   = c.TABLE_NAME
                   AND x.COLUMN_NAME  = c.COLUMN_NAME
WHERE	(c.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%fact%' OR c.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%dim%'  OR c.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%help%' OR c.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%tbl%') 
AND		 c.TABLE_NAME NOT IN ('DimensionAttributeStaging','DerivedDimensionAttributeStaging','DerivedDimensionAttributeValuesStaging','DimensionAttributeTranslationStaging')
ORDER BY c.TABLE_SCHEMA, c.TABLE_NAME, c.ORDINAL_POSITION

sink.preCopyScript:
DELETE a
	FROM metadata.SourceInformationSchema a
WHERE TableCatalog = 'd365-byod-prod'

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName NOT IN ('INCR', 'DWHINCR', 'DWHPART') OR IncrementalLoad = 0) ORDER BY LoadPriority

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'INCR' OR TemplateName = 'DWHINCR') AND IncrementalLoad = 1 ORDER BY LoadPriority

activities.name: Materialize_Incr_Views
activities.description: Copy data from the on-premises source database to the matching cloud sink database

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}  WHERE ModifiedDateTime >= DATEADD(DAY, -5, GETDATE())
SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'FULL_ADD') AND IncrementalLoad = 0 ORDER BY LoadPriority

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'FULL_ADD_EOMonth_Cur') AND IncrementalLoad = 0 ORDER BY LoadPriority
